mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (challenge_id, comment_content, comment_author_id, comment_create_date) VALUES (#{challengeId}, #{commentContent}, #{commentAuthorId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.challenge_id, c.comment_content, c.comment_author_id, c.comment_create_date, u.user_name as commentAuthorName FROM Comment c LEFT JOIN User u ON c.comment_author_id = u.user_id WHERE c.challenge_id = #{challengeId} ORDER BY c.comment_create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
